mapper.select: SELECT M.no, M.m_user, U.id, M.m_delYN, M.m_title, M.m_contents, DATE_FORMAT(M.m_date, '%Y-%m-%d ') AS m_date FROM Message AS M INNER JOIN User AS U ON (U.u_delYN = 'N' and M.m_user = U.no) where 1 = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Message (m_user, m_title, m_contents) VALUES (#{m_user},#{m_title},#{m_contents});
